description: Invalid Message

name: 回復藥
description: 可回復少量體力的藥。

name: 回復藥‧大
description: 可回復中量體力的藥。

name: 秘藥
description: 提升體力上限到最大， 並完全回復的藥。

name: 古老的秘藥
description: 提升體力與耐力上限到最大， 並完全回復的藥。

name: 解毒藥
description: 可回復毒狀態的藥。

name: 漢方藥
description: 可回復毒狀態，並同時 微量回復體力的藥。

name: 打消果實
description: 治癒各種屬性異常狀態的果實。

name: 元氣飲料
description: 可回復耐力的飲料。 睡意也會不翼而飛！

name: 隨身食物
description: 可少量回復耐力的食物。

name: 半熟肉
description: 可中量回復耐力的食物。

name: 全熟肉
description: 可中量回復耐力， 並使最大值不易減少。

name: 烤焦肉
description: 可少量回復耐力的食物。 可以快速吃下。

name: 冷飲
description: 可緩和暑氣一段時間的飲料。

name: 營養劑
description: 微量提升體力上限 的藥。

name: 營養劑“大”
description: 少量提升體力上限 的藥。

name: 活力劑
description: 可提高自然回復力的藥。

name: 星辰肉乾
description: 在調查團據點星辰製作的肉乾。 可提高自然回復力， 治癒裂傷狀態。

name: 強走藥
description: 飲用後不易感到疲勞的藥。 會減低行動所需的 耐力消耗量一段時間。

name: Mega Dash Juice
description: Lets you dash without tiring for longer than regular dash juice does.

name: 怪力種子
description: 吃下後，攻擊力會 暫時上升的種子。

name: 鬼人藥
description: 提升攻擊力的藥。 可獲得如鬼一般的力量。

name: 鬼人藥‧大
description: 據說得到的攻擊力更勝 鬼人藥的夢幻藥品。

name: 怪力藥丸
description: 可暫時獲得如鬼神般的力量的 強力藥丸。

name: 忍耐種子
description: 吃下後，防禦力會 暫時上升的種子。

name: 硬化藥
description: 提升防禦力的藥。 皮膚會硬質化得 如岩石一般。

name: 硬化藥‧大
description: 據說得到的防禦力更勝 硬化藥的夢幻藥品。

name: 忍耐藥丸
description: 可暫時使皮膚硬質化得如鋼鐵一般的 強力的藥丸。

name: 生命粉塵
description: 將回復體力的粉塵撒向四周。

name: 漢方粉塵
description: 將中和毒性及少量回復體力的粉塵 撒向四周。

name: 鬼人粉塵
description: 將暫時提高攻擊力的粉塵 撒向四周。

name: 硬化粉塵
description: 將暫時提高防禦力的粉塵 撒向四周。

name: 蜂蜜
description: 具有高營養價值的蜂蜜。 與回復藥調合即可提高 回復的效果。

name: 藥草
description: 作為回復藥核心素材的草。

name: 解毒草
description: 作為解毒藥核心素材的草。

name: 火藥草
description: 祕藏發火作用的奇草。 調合炸彈所需爆藥的必要素材。

name: 流水草
description: 草葉裡蓄積大量水分的草。 調合水冷彈的必要素材。

name: 霜降草
description: 會釋放寒氣如冰的草。 調合冰結彈的必要素材。

name: 眠草
description: 祕藏睡眠作用的草。 調合捕獲用麻醉球的必要素材。

name: 常春藤葉
description: 柔軟度高且強韌的草。 調合地洞所需網子 的必要素材。

name: 煙果實
description: 能產生大量煙氣的果實。 只要與其他道具調合， 就能將特性附加到煙上。

name: 屠龍果實
description: 據說是龍厭惡忌諱的果實。 調合滅龍彈的必要素材。

name: 青菇
description: 祕藏增強作用的香菇。 調合各種回復道具的必要素材。

name: 風茄
description: 使用方式錯誤可能會致死的 危險香菇。調合秘藥的必要素材。

name: 爆炸菇
description: 祕藏高溫的稀有香菇。 調合炸彈所需爆藥的必要素材。

name: 鬼爆炸菇
description: 祕藏灼熱溫度，非常 稀有的香菇。與大爆彈桶調合 即可爆炸性地提高威力。

name: 麻痺菇
description: 祕藏麻痺作用的香菇。 調合捕獲用麻醉球的必要素材。

name: 毒菇
description: 祕藏毒素的香菇。 可把毒添加到飛刀上。

name: 心跳加速菇
description: 發出奇妙味道的香菇。 調合回歸球的必要素材。

name: 苦蟲
description: 可促進自然治癒能力， 祕藏苦味精華的蟲。 調合許多藥物都會用到。

name: 光蟲
description: 喪命時會放出強烈閃光的蟲。 為投射器閃光彈的核心素材。

name: 不死蟲
description: 據說有一千年壽命的蟲。 只要和其他道具調合， 就能將特性附加到粉塵上。

name: 雷光蟲
description: 施加衝擊就會放電的昆蟲。 調合麻痺陷阱及電擊彈的必要素材。

name: 陸續上鉤黃金餌
description: 作為釣魚魚餌的昆蟲。 魚的最愛，會陸續上鉤的餌。

name: 精靈鹿角
description: 不適合作為武具的素材， 但只要與各種素材調合， 就可成為發揮驚人效果的藥物。

name: 急奔萃取液
description: 可從部份魔物身上 採集到，可增加持久力的 神奇萃取液。

name: 滋養萃取液
description: 可從部份大型魔物身上取得， 可讓特定藥品的效果倍增 的特殊萃取液。

name: 鳴袋
description: 割開就會發出強烈聲音的 魔物內臟器官。 為投射器音爆彈的核心素材。

name: 增強劑
description: 可以將素材及藥品的效力 發揮到最大極限的藥劑。 無法單獨使用。

name: 捕獲用麻醉球
description: 捕獲中陷阱的魔物時 專用的投擲式麻醉球。 可透過敲打地面等方式使用。

name: 投射器閃光彈
description: 以投射器發射，發出 強烈的閃光，在眼前爆炸 即可令魔物滿眼金星。

name: 投射器音爆彈
description: 以投射器發射，會發出高頻率不舒服 的擾人噪音，對聽覺敏銳的魔物 造成行動限制。

name: 煙霧球
description: 從命中地點處散發大範圍的 煙霧，遮蔽魔物的視線。

name: 毒煙霧球
description: 當場投擲出的煙霧球所噴出的煙， 內含毒素。在害蟲對策上 大受主婦們歡迎。

name: 回歸球
description: 可呼叫翼龍， 返回最靠近的營地。 戰鬥狀態也能使用。

name: 生肉
description: 從魔物身上剝取的肉。 可用於調合、調理或設置陷阱， 用途非常廣泛。

name: 毒生肉
description: 吃下後會中毒的生肉。 可作為陷阱使用。

name: 麻痺生肉
description: 吃下後會麻痺的生肉。 可作為陷阱使用。

name: 睡眠生肉
description: 吃下後會想睡的生肉。 可作為陷阱使用。

name: 爆藥
description: 施加衝擊及高溫， 就會引發爆炸的危險藥品。

name: 小木桶
description: 裡面什麼都沒有的小木桶。

name: 小爆彈桶
description: 限時型的小爆彈。

name: 木桶飛彈
description: 架設好就會飛向空中的 改良型炸彈。 需要一點技術才能成功命中。

name: 木桶飛彈Ｇ
description: 木桶飛彈的改良型。 需要一點技術才能成功命中。

name: 大桶
description: 裡面什麼都沒有的大桶。 與爆藥調合就會變成炸彈。

name: 大爆彈桶
description: 受到衝擊就會爆炸的炸彈。 威力甚大。

name: 大爆彈桶Ｇ
description: 大爆彈桶的改良強化版。 對付魔物的可靠道具。 Ｇ的名稱可不是蓋的。

name: 蜘蛛網
description: 黏性強的蜘蛛網。 調合地洞所需網子的 必要素材。

name: 網子
description: 能夠承受相當程度重量的強韌網子。 調合地洞的必要素材。

name: 陷阱工具
description: 製作地洞等等 各種機關時的 必要工具。

name: 地洞
description: 使魔物掉落的陷阱。 只要超過負荷重量 就會發動。

name: 麻痺陷阱
description: 能夠阻止 魔物行動的陷阱。 亦可用於捕獲。

name: 轉動過的糞
description: 魔物的糞的濃縮塊。 為投射器異臭彈的 核心素材。

name: 魔物的糞
description: 散發著強烈的臭味。 為投射器異臭彈的 核心素材。

name: 投射器異臭彈
description: 命中後會發出使魔物 厭惡逃跑的異臭的彈藥。 需裝填到投射器後發射。

name: 龍魚糰子
description: 龍魚系的魚喜愛食用， 呈糰子狀的釣餌。

name: 金魚糰子
description: 火藥金魚喜愛食用， 呈糰子狀的釣餌。

name: 黃金糰子
description: 黃金系的魚喜愛食用， 呈糰子狀的釣餌。

name: 迴力標
description: 投擲後會折返回來， 形狀獨特的外國武器。

name: 望遠鏡
description: 可以眺望到遠方。

name: 力量之護符
description: 提升攻擊力的護符。 光持有就可獲得如 鬼人般的力量。

name: 力量之爪
description: 提升攻擊力的護符。 加入了龍的素材， 更加提高護符的效果。

name: 守護之護符
description: 提升防禦力的護符。 光持有就可使皮膚硬質化 得如岩石一般。

name: 守護之爪
description: 提升防禦力的護符。 加入了龍的素材， 更加提高護符的效果。

name: 針果實
description: 像針一樣銳利的樹果。 為散彈的核心素材。

name: 爆裂果實
description: 作為徹甲榴彈核心素材的樹果。

name: 龍擊果實
description: 受到衝擊就會爆炸的樹果。 為龍擊彈的核心素材。

name: 斬裂果實
description: 作為斬裂彈核心素材的樹果。

name: 螺旋果實
description: 具有螺旋狀溝槽的樹果。 為貫通彈的核心素材。

name: 擴散果實
description: 受到衝擊就會破裂的樹果。 為擴散彈的核心素材。

name: 著火果實
description: 作為提高彈藥威力的火藥粉的 核心素材的樹果。

name: 發火果實
description: 作為大幅提高彈藥威力的火藥粉的 所需核心素材的樹果。

name: LV2 火藥粉
description: 粉末狀的火藥。 與LV1的彈藥調合 即可提升彈藥的等級。

name: LV3 火藥粉
description: 優質的粉末狀火藥。 與LV1的彈藥調合 即可提升彈藥的等級。

name: 堅硬竹筴魚的鰭
description: 可以研磨武器的背鰭。 研磨所需次數比砥石更少， 銳利度的回復量也較大。

name: 堅硬竹筴魚的上鰭
description: 可以研磨武器的背鰭。 效果高過砥石， 運氣好的話可多次重複使用。

name: 刺身魚鱗片
description: 刺身魚的鱗片。 吃下即可少量回復體力。 對裂傷狀態也有效果。

name: 大刺身魚鱗片
description: 大刺身魚的鱗片。 吃下即可大量回復體力，並使 自然回復力UP。對裂傷狀態也有效果。

name: 火藥金魚鱗片
description: 火藥金魚的鱗片。 與大爆彈桶調合 即可飛躍性地提高威力。

name: 大火藥金魚鱗片
description: 大火藥金魚的鱗片。 與大桶調合 即可製作出大爆彈桶Ｇ。

name: 破裂鱗片
description: 破裂龍魚的鱗片。 與火藥草調合即可精製出 許多LV2 火藥粉。

name: 大破裂鱗片
description: 上等破裂龍魚的鱗片。 與火藥草調合即可精製出 大量的LV2 火藥粉。

name: 爆裂鱗片
description: 爆裂龍魚的鱗片。 與火藥草調合即可精製出 許多LV3 火藥粉。

name: 大爆裂鱗片
description: 上等爆裂龍魚的鱗片。 與火藥草調合即可精製出 大量的LV3 火藥粉。

name: Whetstone
description: A standard-sized whetstone. Use it to restore a weapon's sharpness.

name: Capture Net
description: A net that can be fired from your slinger. Use it to capture small creatures.

name: Fishing Rod
description: A tool used for fishing.

name: BBQ Spit
description: Just what you need to cook meat. A must-have item for any hungry hunter.

name: Ghillie Mantle
description: Conceal yourself from view temporarily. The effect ends if you perform an attack or take damage.

name: Temporal Mantle
description: Nullify damage from powerful attacks by automatically evading.

name: Health Booster
description: Once spiked into the ground, it emits a healing cloud that gradually restores the health of anyone who stands in it.

name: Rocksteady Mantle
description: Stands firm against certain attacks, and gives you protection against wind pressure, roars, tremors. Also lessens damage.

name: Challenger Mantle
description: Attracts monsters to you, making it easier to lure them to a favorable position.

name: Vitality Mantle
description: Nullifies a set amount of damage. The effect ends if more than that amount is taken.

name: Fireproof Mantle
description: Reduces fire element damage and nullifies fireblight, blastblight, and heat damage.

name: Waterproof Mantle
description: Reduces water element damage, nullifies waterblight and mud. Lets you wade through deep water easier.

name: Iceproof Mantle
description: Reduces ice element damage and nullifies iceblight.

name: Thunderproof Mantle
description: Reduces thunder element damage. Nullifies thunderblight and paralysis.

name: Dragonproof Mantle
description: Reduces dragon element damage. Nullifies dragonblight while raising dragon element attack.

name: Cleanser Booster
description: Once spiked into the ground, it emits a healing cloud that cures any abnormal status of anyone who stands in it.

name: Glider Mantle
description: Extends air time when jumping, lets you ride on strong winds, and makes it easier to mount monsters.

name: Evasion Mantle
description: Extends the invulnerability window of evasive actions. Dodge attacks at the last minute for an attack boost.

name: Impact Mantle
description: Adds a stun value to most attacks, and enhances the effect of attacks which cause stun.

name: Apothecary Mantle
description: Increases the likelihood of weapons with abnormal status attacks to contribute to status buildup.

name: Immunity Mantle
description: Clears all abnormal statuses and grants immunity from them for a limited amount of time.

name: Affinity Booster
description: Once spiked into the ground, it emits a cloud of mist that boosts affinity for you and surrounding teammates.

name: Bandit Mantle
description: Makes attacks against large monsters drop rare and valuable trade-in items.

name: LV1通常彈
description: 可說是入門用的彈藥。 威力不太能期待。

name: LV2通常彈
description: 一般彈藥。 威力較LV1大增。 最多攜帶99發。

name: LV3通常彈
description: 使用優質火藥，提升更多威力的彈藥。 即便是單發也能發揮足夠的力量。 最多攜帶99發。

name: LV1貫通彈
description: 持續貫通飛行的彈藥。 視魔物不同甚至可命中多次。 最多攜帶60發。

name: LV2貫通彈
description: 持續貫通飛行的彈藥。 命中次數更勝LV1。 最多攜帶60發。

name: LV3貫通彈
description: 貫通飛行的彈藥。 命中次數為貫通彈系最高。 最多攜帶60發。

name: LV1散彈
description: 可攻擊大範圍的彈藥。 靠近發射的話，可複數次命中目標。 最多攜帶80發。

name: LV2散彈
description: 可攻擊大範圍的彈藥。 命中次數更勝LV1。 最多攜帶70發。

name: LV3散彈
description: 可攻擊大範圍的彈藥。 命中次數為散彈系最高。 最多攜帶60發。

name: LV1徹甲榴彈
description: 穿刺後會爆炸的彈藥。 具有高超的威力與昏厥效果。 最多攜帶9發。

name: LV2徹甲榴彈
description: 穿刺後會爆炸的彈藥。 具有相當高超的威力與昏厥效果。 最多攜帶9發。

name: LV3徹甲榴彈
description: 穿刺後會爆炸的彈藥。 具有驚人的威力與昏厥效果。 最多攜帶9發。

name: LV1擴散彈
description: 命中時會飛散出3顆炸彈的彈藥。 必須小心不要打中夥伴。 最多3發。

name: LV2擴散彈
description: 命中時會飛散出4顆炸彈的彈藥。 必須小心不要打中夥伴。 最多3發。

name: LV3擴散彈
description: 命中時會飛散出5顆炸彈的彈藥。 必須小心不要打中夥伴。 最多3發。

name: 火炎彈
description: 擁有強力火屬性的彈藥。 對怕火的魔物相當有效。 最多攜帶60發。

name: 水冷彈
description: 擁有強力水屬性的彈藥。 對怕水的魔物相當有效。 最多攜帶60發。

name: 電擊彈
description: 擁有強力雷屬性的彈藥。 對怕雷的魔物相當有效。 最多攜帶60發。

name: 冰結彈
description: 擁有強力冰屬性的彈藥。 對怕冰的魔物相當有效。 最多攜帶60發。

name: 滅龍彈
description: 擁有龍屬性，具備龍封力的彈藥。 對害怕龍屬性的魔物相當有效。 最多攜帶3發。

name: LV1毒彈
description: 造成毒狀態的彈藥。 視魔物不同可能需要多發。 最多攜帶12發。

name: LV2毒彈
description: 造成毒狀態的彈藥強化版。 視魔物不同可能需要多發。 最多攜帶12發。

description: 瘴氣之谷的稀有特產品。 在嚴峻的環境下也能生長的水果。 （結算道具）

name: 彼岸的果實
description: 瘴氣之谷的貴重特產品。 香味令人覺得不屬於這世界的水果。 （結算道具）

name: 大地琥珀
description: 龍結晶之地的特產品。 從大地中自然滲出的美麗琥珀。 （結算道具）

name: 龍脈琥珀
description: 龍結晶之地的稀有特產品。 可感受到大地能量的琥珀。 （結算道具）

name: 太古琥珀
description: 龍結晶之地的貴重特產品。 蘊藏著太古記憶的琥珀。 （結算道具）

name: 藍色海石
description: 龍結晶之地的特產品。 會令人憶起大海的藍色寶石。 （結算道具）

name: 真實海石
description: 龍結晶之地的稀有特產品。 有著如看透真實般通透顏色的寶石。 （結算道具）

name: 深淵海石
description: 龍結晶之地的貴重特產品。 有著像要被吸入般深邃顏色的寶石。 （結算道具）

name: Sunkissed Grass
description: A special plant from the Ancient Forest. Known to cure all types of diseases. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Account Item)</STYL>

name: 月夜茸
description: 古代樹森林的特別特產品。 綻放著如月光般淡淡光輝的茸菇。 （結算道具）

name: Dragonbloom
description: A special flower from the Wildspire Waste. Hard as dragon scale. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Account Item)</STYL>

name: Divineapple
description: Special fruit from the Wildspire Waste. Quite difficult to cultivate. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Account Item)</STYL>

name: Violet Abalone
description: Special seafood from the Coral Highlands. Unique in both taste and aroma. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Account Item)</STYL>

name: Platinum Pearl
description: A special jewel from the Coral Highlands. Bears a metallic sheen. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Account Item)</STYL>

name: Wicked Fossil
description: A special fossil from the Rotten Vale. Unspeakably ominous. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Account Item)</STYL>

name: Heavenberry
description: Special fruit from the Rotten Vale. One bite'll send you to the pearly gates. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Account Item)</STYL>

name: Twilight Stone
description: A special gem from the Elder's Recess. The color of a sinking sun. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Account Item)</STYL>

name: Noahstone
description: A special gem from the Elder's Recess. Its brilliance engulfs all. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Account Item)</STYL>

name: Wyvern Egg
description: A flying wyvern's egg. Deliver it back to camp...if you can. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Account Item)</STYL>

name: Herbivore Egg
description: An herbivore egg. Deliver it back to camp...if you can. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Account Item)</STYL>

name: Lump of Meat
description: A lump of meat left by an Odogaron. Its distinct odor lures carnivores. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Account Item)</STYL>

name: Shepherd Hare
description: An animal often seen scurrying down narrow side paths. Follow one and you might discover a new shortcut.

name: Pilot Hare
description: A rare animal that appears on sunny days. They've been said to guide travelers who have lost their way.

name: Woodland Pteryx
description: A bird common to forested areas. Its bones and feathers resemble those of a prehistoric creature.

name: Forest Pteryx
description: A rare bird. Though it resembles fossilized species, it also has unprecedented physical features.

name: Cobalt Flutterfly
description: A beautiful, vibrant butterfly with cobalt-blue wings.

name: Phantom Flutterfly
description: A brightly-colored, incredibly rare butterfly. The few sightings reported of it have all been on sunny days.

name: Climbing Joyperch
description: An amphibian that has retained many of its ancient characteristics. Their songs can be heard during rainfall.

name: Forest Gekko
description: An arboreal lizard often found near brightmoss, predating on the insects that are drawn to the light.

name: Wildspire Gekko
description: A lizard found near ant hills. Exceptionally large ant hills can draw surprisingly large numbers.

name: Gloom Gekko
description: A lizard found in caves and other dark places. Their coloration serves as a warning to ward off predators.

name: Moonlight Gekko
description: A rare lizard whose brightmoss diet causes its tail to glow, a trait it uses to lure in prey.

name: Vaporonid
description: An Ancient Forest spider that spins webs larger in size than humans.

name: Scavantula
description: A ground-dwelling spider whose chief diet is rotting flesh. Often found living in groups near bonepiles.

name: Revolture
description: A carrion-eating bird that scavenges meat from carcasses. It is often spotted flying above large monsters.

name: Blissbill
description: An herbivorous bird that feeds on fruits and seeds. Comfortable around humans and common near Astera.

name: Omenfly
description: Insects that emit light from their tails. They usually glow white, but will glow red when in danger.

name: Augurfly
description: A strange, rare insect that appears during foul weather. They only enter their adult stage during rainfall.

name: Scalebat
description: A flying wyvern that evolved to adapt to life in caves, taking on a much smaller, bat-like appearance.

name: Dung Beetle
description: A beetle known to roll balls of monster dung. This process hardens the dung into fine Slinger ammo.

name: Bomb Beetle
description: A beetle known to roll large stones. Gathering from those stones often yields Slinger bomb pods.

name: Pink Parexus
description: A fish whose physiology remains almost unchanged from its ancient ancestors. Its spiny fins help ward off predators.

name: Great Pink Parexus
description: A jumbo-sized Pink Parexus. It must have lived for countless years to reach this size.

name: Burst Arowana
description: Fish that smell of gunpowder. Use their scales and fire herbs to craft large amounts of gunpowder.

name: Bomb Arowana
description: Fish that smell of gunpowder. Use their scales and fire herbs to craft large amounts of quality gunpowder.

name: Great Burst Arowana
description: A jumbo-sized Burst Arowana. Greater in size and volatility. Handle with extreme care.

name: Great Bomb Arowana
description: A jumbo-sized Bomb Arowana. Greater in size and volatility. Handle with extreme care.

name: Elegant Coralbird
description: The common name for a female Coralbird. Their vibrant pink color is a result of their coral diet.

name: Dapper Coralbird
description: The common name for a Coralbird male. Extremely rare, as they only appear for mating.

name: Andangler
description: A fish bearing a luminous protrusion on its head, which it uses to lure Flying Meduso, its primary prey.

name: Downy Crake
description: A legendarily rare bird, covered in decadently soft down. It travels atop the back of its symbiotic host.

name: Bristly Crake
description: A legendarily rare bird, covered in bizarrely stiff, bristly down. It travels atop the back of its symbiotic host.

name: Hopguppy
description: A fish that bounces across the surface of the water, spreading its pectoral fins to glide farther.

name: Petricanths
description: Previously known via fossils, this species was thought extinct. Finding otherwise was a real surprise.

name: Paratoad
description: A toad that releases paralyzing gas on impact. Its effect is potent enough to paralyze even large monsters.

name: Sleeptoad
description: A toad that releases sleeping gas on impact. Its effect is potent enough to put down even large monsters.

name: Nitrotoad
description: A toad that secretes an explosive gel on impact. The blast is strong enough to stagger even large monsters.

name: Wiggler
description: A creature from the Coral Highlands. Match its eye level to put it at ease, allowing you to approach it.

name: Wiggler Queen
description: A rare creature that appears only on moonlit nights. Watching it dance on the breeze is a truly magical sight.

name: Vigorwasp
description: An insect that collects restorative nectar in its body, releasing it in a cloud when struck.

name: Giant Vigorwasp
description: An insect that stores a highly concentrated nectar which leaves a restorative cloud when released.

name: Flying Meduso
description: A native to the Coral Highlands that moves by riding the wind. Found in areas with the strongest breezes.

name: Carrier Ant
description: Ants that are known to carry about all sorts of items, including, rarely, large monster materials.

name: Hercudrome
description: A large beetle with impressive horns. Hercudromes only inhabit seven specific spots in the Ancient Forest.

name: Gold Hercudrome
description: A glistening golden beetle, thought to bring good fortune. It only appears at night.

name: Prism Hercudrome
description: A shiny, rainbow-colored beetle. Due to its crepuscular nature, it is only usually seen at dawn and dusk.

name: Emperor Hopper
description: A grasshopper as big as its moniker would suggest. Its swift, frenetic jumps make it hard to capture.

name: Tyrant Hopper
description: This previously docile, herbivorous insect underwent phase variation to become a vicious carrion-eater.

name: Flashfly
description: An insect that emits a bright flash when struck, which is brighter when in a swarm. The flash blinds monsters.

name: Grandfather Mantagrell
description: A creature that rides air currents to float in midair. Weak to impacts, one good blow will bring it down.

name: Iron Helmcrab
description: A crustacean found in muddy terrain. It frequently carries hard objects, and occasionally drops piercing pods.

name: Soldier Helmcrab
description: A crustacean native to the Rotten Vale. They travel in large packs, stripping meat from carcasses.

name: Emerald Helmcrab
description: A beautiful crustacean usually seen during inclement weather. It's said to be rarer than its gem namesake.

name: Whetfish
description: A fish with a dorsal fin hard enough to be used to sharpen weapons.

name: Great Whetfish
description: A jumbo-sized Whetfish. Its dorsal fin surpasses even whetstones in its sharpness.

name: Gastronome Tuna
description: A fish that eats anything— allowing you to sometimes get items from its stomach.

name: Great Gastronome Tuna
description: A jumbo-sized Gastronome Tuna. Its ravenous diet has ballooned it into the king of gluttons.

name: King Marlin
description: A fish with a jaw shaped like a sword. Inhabits warm waters, and cannot be seen during cold nights.

name: Great King Marlin
description: A jumbo-sized King Marlin. Its overwhelming size makes it seem like a different species entirely.

name: Goldenfish
description: A rare fish that glitters as if it was actual gold. Its scales can fetch the same price as gold, too!

name: Platinumfish
description: A rare fish that shines like platinum, with glimmering scales just as valuable.

name: Great Goldenfish
description: A jumbo-sized Goldenfish. Not only is it bigger, its color and luster rival the finest craftsman's art.

name: Great Platinumfish
description: A jumbo-sized Platinumfish. Not only is it bigger, its color and luster rival the finest craftsman's art.

name: Goldenfry
description: A small, rare fish that glitters like gold, and whose beautiful scales sell for just as much.

name: Great Goldenfry
description: A jumbo-sized Goldenfry. Not only is it bigger, its color and luster rival the finest craftsman's art.

name: Sushifish
description: A fatty fish popular among hunters. Its scales are rich in nutrients and can restore health.

name: Great Sushifish
description: A jumbo-sized Sushifish. Generously plump from its bountiful supply of food.

name: Gunpowderfish
description: A fish that smells of gunpowder. Its unique scales can be used as explosive powder.

name: Great Gunpowderfish
description: A jumbo-sized Gunpowderfish. Greater in size and volatility. Handle with extreme care.

name: Fertilizer Jewel 1
description: A decoration that boosts Dungmaster skills.

name: Heat Resist Jewel 2
description: A decoration that boosts Heat Guard skills.

name: Powercoat Jewel 3
description: A decoration that enhances the Power Functionality skill.

name: Rodeo Jewel 2
description: A decoration that boosts Mounting skills.

name: Flying Leap Jewel 1
description: A decoration that boosts Leap of Faith skills.

name: Angler Jewel 1
description: A decoration that boosts Master Fisher skills.

name: Chef Jewel 1
description: A decoration that boosts Spitmaster skills.

name: Transporter Jewel 1
description: A decoration that boosts Transporter skills.

name: Gathering Jewel 1
description: A decoration that boosts Gathering skills.

name: Honeybee Jewel 1
description: A decoration that enhances the Honey Hunter skill.

name: Carver Jewel 1
description: A decoration that enhances the Carving Pro skill.

name: Scoutfly Jewel 1
description: A decoration that enhances the Scoutfly Range skill.

name: Crouching Jewel 1
description: A decoration that enhances the Speed Crawler skill.

name: Longjump Jewel 1
description: A decoration that enhances the Jump Master skill.

name: Climber Jewel 1
description: A decoration that boosts Cliffhanger skills.

name: Radiosity Jewel 1
description: A decoration that boosts Blindsider skills.

name: Research Jewel 1
description: A decoration that boosts Scholar skills.

name: Slider Jewel 1
description: A decoration that enhances the Dive Distance skill.

name: Hazmat Jewel 1
description: A decoration that boosts Effluvial Expert skills.

name: Mudshield Jewel 1
description: A decoration that enhances the Mudproof skill.

name: Element Resist Jewel 1
description: A decoration that boosts Res Down Protection skills.

name: Discovery Jewel 2
description: A decoration that enhances the Rare Gatherer skill.

name: Detector Jewel 1
description: A decoration that enhances the Rare Hunter skill.

name: Vigorwasp Delivery
description: Signal to your Palico to use their Palico Gadget.

name: Vigorwasp Station
description: Signal to your Palico to use their Palico Gadget.

name: Flashfly Cage
description: Signal to your Palico to use their Palico Gadget.

name: Thunderbug Cage
description: Signal to your Palico to use their Palico Gadget.

name: Shieldspire Taunt
description: Signal to your Palico to use their Palico Gadget.

name: Shieldspire Bash
description: Signal to your Palico to use their Palico Gadget.

name: Coral Cheerhorn
description: Signal to your Palico to use their Palico Gadget.

name: Coral Cheerbongo
description: Signal to your Palico to use their Palico Gadget.

name: Plunderblade
description: Signal to your Palico to use their Palico Gadget.

name: Palarang
description: Signal to your Palico to use their Palico Gadget.

name: Meowlotov Assault
description: Signal to your Palico to use their Palico Gadget.

name: Rath-of-Meow
description: Signal to your Palico to use their Palico Gadget.

name: Invalid Message
description: Invalid Message

name: Invalid Message
description: Invalid Message

name: Invalid Message
description: Invalid Message

name: Invalid Message
description: Invalid Message

name: Stone
description: Slinger ammo that can be used to hit faraway plant life and bombs.

name: Redpit
description: Slinger ammo that can be used to hit faraway plant life and bombs.

name: Brightmoss
description: Slinger ammo that illuminates an area upon impact. Can also blind flying wyverns.

name: Scatternut
description: Slinger ammo that explodes on impact. Use it to stagger a monster when you're in a pinch.

name: Torch Pod
description: Slinger ammo that can be used to scare away small monsters or to illuminate dark areas.

name: Bomb Pod
description: Slinger ammo that explodes on impact.

name: Thorn Pod
description: Slinger ammo with a thorny husk that sticks to monster hide. Attack it to produce a shock.

name: Piercing Pod
description: Slinger ammo that deals piercing damage on impact.

name: Dragon Pod
description: Slinger ammo that deals dragon element damage.

name: Crystalburst
description: Slinger ammo that explodes on impact. Use it to stagger a monster when you're in a pinch.

name: Puddle Pod
description: Slinger ammo imbued with the water element. It can also wash monsters clean of stuck-on mud.

name: 冰冷菇
description: 作為冷飲的 核心素材的香菇。

name: 隨從票
description: 在新大陸與相遇的獸人種交流的象徵。 交給加工屋後，會……？

name: Emerald Shell
description: An emerald Helmcrab carapace, every bit as lovely as its gem namesake. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Trade-in Item)</STYL>

name: 奇面族寫生
description: 在新大陸相遇的奇面族的寫生畫。 交給加工屋後，會……？

name: 恐暴龍的黑鱗
description: 恐暴龍的進階素材。 主要經由剝取獲得。 泛用性高、用途廣泛。

name: 恐暴龍的黑皮
description: 恐暴龍的進階素材。 主要經由報酬獲得。 材質柔軟，常用於防具上。

name: 恐暴龍的大牙
description: 恐暴龍的進階素材。 容易經由破壞頭部部位獲得。 材質堅固，常用於武器上。

name: 恐暴龍的鉤爪
description: 恐暴龍的進階素材。 主要經由剝取獲得。 與龍屬性的相容性佳。

name: 恐暴龍的頭殼
description: 恐暴龍的進階素材。 容易經由破壞頭部位獲得。 材質特殊，只能用於限定的裝備。

name: 恐暴龍的尾巴
description: 恐暴龍的進階素材。 容易經由切斷的尾巴獲得。 材質強韌，常用於防具上。

name: 恐暴龍的唾液
description: 恐暴龍的進階素材。 容易經由掉落物獲得。 材質特殊，使用上需具備技術。

name: 恐暴龍的寶玉
description: 恐暴龍的進階素材。 據說是在體內生成的稀有玉石。 可飛躍性地提高武器性能。

name: 絢輝龍的金鱗
description: 絢輝龍的進階素材。 主要經由報酬獲得。 有不少人為了能獲得一枚而豁出性命。

name: 絢輝龍的金殼
description: 絢輝龍的進階素材。 主要經由報酬獲得。 據說和黃金具有同等價值。

name: 絢輝龍的金塊
description: 絢輝龍的進階素材。 容易經由掉落物獲得。 綻放妖豔光芒，迷惑他人的黃金塊。

name: 絢輝龍的金卷角
description: 絢輝龍的進階素材。 容易經由破壞頭部部位獲得。 層層堆疊的金子散發出厚重的光輝。

name: 絢輝龍的金尾殼
description: 絢輝龍的進階素材。 容易經由破壞尾巴部位獲得。 融解的黃金發出豔麗的光彩。

name: 絢輝龍的金煌玉
description: 絢輝龍的進階素材。 據說是在體內生成的夢幻寶玉。 能帶來難以估計的力量。

name: 黃金石碎片
description: 純度高的黃金石碎片。 雖然極為少量，但價格卻很高。 （換金道具）

name: 黃金石塊
description: 形成塊狀的貴重黃金石。 那綻放的光芒能擄獲任何人的心。 （換金道具）

name: 炎妃龍的上鱗
description: 炎妃龍的進階素材。 主要經由剝取獲得。 泛用性高、用途廣泛。

name: 炎妃龍之翼
description: 炎妃龍的進階素材。 容易經由破壞翅膀部位獲得。 材質柔軟，常用於防具上。

name: 炎妃龍的寶玉
description: 炎妃龍的進階素材。 據說是在體內生成的夢幻寶玉。 藏有難以估計的力量。

name: 炎妃龍的堅殼
description: 炎妃龍的進階素材。 主要經由報酬獲得。 材質堅硬，常用於防具上。

name: 炎妃龍的鬃毛
description: 炎妃龍的進階素材。 容易經由掉落物獲得。 火耐性高，是貴重的素材。

name: 炎妃龍的尾巴
description: 炎妃龍的進階素材。 容易經由切斷的尾巴獲得。 材質強韌，常用於防具上。

name: 炎妃龍的尖角
description: 炎妃龍的進階素材。 容易經由破壞頭部部位獲得。 材質堅固，常用於武器上。

name: 開花票
description: 參加星辰祭【開花之宴】 就能獲得的票券。可以用來 交換特別的裝備或煙火。

name: 納涼票
description: 參加星辰祭【納涼之宴】 就能獲得的票券。可以用來 交換特別的裝備或煙火。

name: 豐收票
description: 參加星辰祭【豐收之宴】 就能獲得的票券。可以用來 交換特別的裝備或煙火。

name: 閃耀票
description: 參加星辰祭【閃耀之宴】 就能獲得的票券。可以用來 交換特別的裝備或煙火。

name: Unavailable
description: Unavailable

name: 昆蟲圖鑑【春】
description: 記載大角鳳蝶不為人知的生態的 圖鑑。交給加工屋後，他們會 製作別有風味的防具。

name: 昆蟲圖鑑【夏】
description: 記載著大角鳳蝶的新生態的 圖鑑。交給加工屋後， 他們會製作別有風味的防具。

name: 屍套龍票
description: 一張票，上面畫著潛藏在永恆黑暗裡的 屍套龍。交給加工屋後，他們會 製作別有風味的防具。

name: 幻獸票
description: 一張票，上面畫著百雷交加的 幻獸。交給加工屋後，他們會 製作別有風味的防具。

name: Teostra Ticket
description: A ticket bearing Teostra, ruling over purgatory. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

name: Kushala Daora Ticket
description: A ticket bearing Kushala Daora, commanding the winds. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

name: Unavailable
description: Unavailable

name: Zorah Magdaros Ticket
description: A ticket bearing Zorah, trampling over the New World. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

name: Xeno'jiiva Ticket
description: A ticket bearing Xeno'jiiva, elder dragon transcended. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

name: 黑色繃帶
description: 使用以黑色光澤為其特徵的 魔物皮革所製成的道具。 無法以正常管道獲得。

name: 黑水晶票
description: 可用來交換散發黑暗光芒， 彷彿會將人吸入的石頭之票券。 無法以正常管道獲得。

name: 搔鳥票
description: 給予對搔鳥的調查 有貢獻者的票券， 並附贈精緻的素描畫。

name: 搖曳鰻票
description: 給予對搖曳鰻的調查有貢獻者的 票券，並附贈熱情的生物 調查員的親筆插圖。

name: 洛克人票
description: 洛克人的合作活動票。 可以生產用8bit風格造型畫出的 特別隨從裝備。

name: 蒼星碎片
description: 對於回應來自USJ挑戰的人 所給予的特別素材。 散發著蒼藍色的清澈光芒。

name: 蒼星寶玉
description: 給予通過來自USJ考驗者 的特別素材。 散發著如奇蹟般的蒼藍色光芒。

name: 紅魂石
description: 魔族的血濃縮而成的紅色魔石。 可以用來打造帥氣的 惡魔獵人裝備。

name: 名匠的設計圖
description: 名匠畫出的革新設計圖。 交給加工屋的話，他們會製作出 前所未見，極具衝擊性的大劍。

name: Dissolved Weapon
description: A weapon carved from Kulve Taroth. Must be repaired before it can be used. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Appraised after investigation)</STYL>

name: Melded Weapon
description: A weapon carved from Kulve Taroth. Some parts have been infused with gold. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Appraised after investigation)</STYL>

name: Sublimated Weapon
description: A weapon carved from Kulve Taroth Strengthened by being infused with gold. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Appraised after investigation)</STYL>

name: 黎明武士票
description: 給予協助進行特別調查任務者的票。 交給調查資源管理所就會有 好事發生！？

name: Blossom Fireworks
description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Spring Blossom Fest. Light up the sky and enjoy the festivities!

name: Twilight Fireworks
description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Summer Twilight Fest. Enjoy the summer heat with a bang!

name: Harvest Fireworks
description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Autumn Harvest Fest. Dance till the ground lights up in a blaze!

name: Star Fireworks
description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Winter Star Fest. Enjoy the festivities with a bang!

name: Unavailable
description: Unavailable

name: Gold Scalebat
description: A relative of the Scalebat, this nocturnal hunter developed a shiny coat as a result of inhabiting the golden underground.

name: Gold Helmcrab
description: A creature that hoards Dragon Pods. It has gained the attention of those studying the flow of the Everstream.

name: Shiny Gold Helmcrab
description: A creature that has hoarded a vast amount of Dragon Pods. The key to the Kulve Taroth mystery?

name: Copper Calappa
description: A creature that feeds on gold frag- ments dropped by Taroth. Its shell becomes more golden by the year.

name: Gold Calappa
description: A Calappa whose shine matches its old age. These creatures are often called living gold nuggets.

name: Tsuchinoko
description: A creature that exists only in eye- witness reports. To catch one is to become rich beyond imagination.

name: 黄金片碎片
description: 銅饅頭蟹所採集到的 絢輝龍痕跡的碎片。 （換金道具）

name: Gold Nugget Fragment
description: A fragment that can only be harvested from a very heavy Taroth track. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Trade-in Item)</STYL>
